title: EFS
author: EFS
content: I registered in this forum ten years ago. I've found out about Bitcoin and this forum in early 2013 but didn't need to register back then. I signed up on 26th July 2013 and I'm here for a decade. I never imagined I'd be here this long. This forum has been an important part of my life, just like Bitcoin.Glad I decided to sign-up here 10 years ago. Here I met very good people from all nationalities, made good friends and had job opportunities. Even though sometimes I took a break from writing to the forum due to dramas and tiredness, I never stopped moderating the forum. I tried my best to make the forum work as intended.I hope to be here longer. I think I'll stay here until Theymos decides to close the forum. I would like to see at least new forum software.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: I like this old forum softwareÂ  This forum is an important part of my life as well, just like bitcoin. Both of them changed my life, for better.I am here for 5 years and a half. Your 10 y mark is impressive. Congrats

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: Quote from: EFS on July 26, 2023, 07:58:58 PMI registered in this forum ten years ago. I've found out about Bitcoin and this forum in early 2013 but didn't need to register back then. I signed up on 26th July 2013 and I'm here for a decade. I never imagined I'd be here this long. This forum has been an important part of my life, just like Bitcoin.~~Hey dude congrats, It's really a long time, You have spent almost half of my life on this forum.And your time and effort really paid off, and the best example is today's EFS .Wishing you good health, best wishes for the next long journey.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Wow  congratulations on 10 years in this forum, it's amazing you have become a lot of motivation even with other members.I've been here for a long time, but I've also been inactive for other reasons, next year will be just a celebration for 1 decade. Yeah, now we know the forum has become part of our nose.

comments.author: CryptoHFs
comments.body: A forum like this should never be closed... but sometimes things go away and as long as you have this thoughts it means the idea may have been suggested before. Good things never last.A question for this. If you decided to close the forum what happens to the forum treasure then? I mean is it your own money or you will be sending it back to Satoshi known addresses?

comments.author: Falconer
comments.body: EFS, happy 10th birthday to you. I don't have many words to make you happy, but still be the best regardless of your position.October 17, 2024 I too will have 10 years on this forum. Obviously that would be a lot of fun, but my 9th birthday will soon be on October 17, 2023.As one of bitcointalk user, we know you as a good user and a good staff. Once again, congrats, EFS.

comments.author: 2Pizza410000BTC
comments.body: 10 Years / 3650 Days You have spent the precious time of your life in this forum. May every second of your life be filled with endless joy and variety. We all will never forget the contribution of an important person like you.Anyway congratulations @EFS

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I can still remember creating my first thread after which I received some suggestions to learn about the forum, how everything works and also improve my Bitcoin and crypto knowledge in other for me to be able to contribute to discussion. And I'm pretty sure some of your posts and contribution to several were among those I read that helped me during my growth here in the forum.You have been able to achieve so many things since you came to the forum, from just registering an account to becoming a staff, so I want to use this opportunity to congratulate you on all your achievement and I pray you achieve more. Congratulations @EFS

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: EFS on July 26, 2023, 07:58:58 PMI registered in this forum ten years ago. I've found out about Bitcoin and this forum in early 2013 but didn't need to register back then. I signed up on 26th July 2013 and I'm here for a decade. I never imagined I'd be here this long. This forum has been an important part of my life, just like Bitcoin.Glad I decided to sign-up here 10 years ago. Here I met very good people from all nationalities, made good friends and had job opportunities. Even though sometimes I took a break from writing to the forum due to dramas and tiredness, I never stopped moderating the forum. I tried my best to make the forum work as intended.I hope to be here longer. I think I'll stay here until Theymos decides to close the forum. I would like to see at least new forum software. Congrats on 10 years!!! Hopefully the forum doesn't close any time soon, so we should see you here for another 10 years I think.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Congrats! Only few legendary bitcoin OGs can do that. What an achievement perhaps. Coz others were already passed away, getting tired, inactive, tried to lie low, yet you are here almost everyday active knowing you are an active mod and a signature campaign participant. I hope we are still here in another decade, long live bitcointalk. ðŸ¥³

comments.author: Liliana1304
comments.body: Congratulations EFS! I can only imagine how nostalgic you are on how time flies.. ten years ago, you were just finding your way round the forum and now, you're not just a reputable member, but you've got ten years under your belt to show for it. I may not have as much years as you (as I'm still literally a baby here) but at least I got ranked up to a member status today. Congrats on your milestone achievement.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Congratulations!Ten years have passed today. Many important improvements have been made to the forum due to your valuable input. We would love to see your contributions until the end of the forum. We always look forward to seeing you improve the forum. Finally I wish you all the best and good health. Enjoy every moment with your family.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: EFS on July 26, 2023, 07:58:58 PMI hope to be here longer. I think I'll stay here until Theymos decides to close the forum. I would like to see at least new forum software. Congratulations for this 10th year Anniversary. Staying this long is what an achievement! I hope to stay longer like that too. Looking forward for that new software and hope this forum dont close anytime sooner. A lot of people got helped by this forum and it will be sad to see this close. At least not yet. :p

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Happy 10th birthday to EFS, 10 years on this forum is a very long time, and I consider those who have spent a decade on this forum to be my gurus.I wish EFS and other seniors good health, longevity so they can continue to play a good role in this forum.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Quote from: EFS on July 26, 2023, 07:58:58 PMI registered in this forum ten years ago. I've found out about Bitcoin and this forum in early 2013 but didn't need to register back then. I signed up on 26th July 2013 and I'm here for a decade. I never imagined I'd be here this long.You are here four years ahead of me. I will have to go through another bear market, four more years to celebrate my 10 years anniversaryÂ  QuoteThis forum has been an important part of my life, just like Bitcoin.Me too.QuoteGlad I decided to sign-up here 10 years ago. Here I met very good people from all nationalities, made good friends and had job opportunities.Have you ever joined the interview by zasad@?If you joined it, could you share your answer link here, please. Because I believe your answers in that interview have more information about your journey in Bitcointalk.QuoteI hope to be here longer. I think I'll stay here until Theymos decides to close the forum. I would like to see at least new forum software. I believe theymos will not close this forum and if he plan to abandon it, he will give it to a second admin (Cyrus) or other global moderators to take over the head admin position. Similar to how theymos took over the forum from satoshi.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: One of the OG of this forum congrats for 10 years.All know so hard to became an active member on one platform and 10 years is a great achievement so congrats and for sure other more will follow to this 10th year milestone.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Many congrats to your amazing journey.Â  Ten years is a long time and I hope you saved up some coins in early time and made some money out of it.I see you also reached to be a staff here. Congrats to that to!Â  I guess you have contributed a lot to this forum in your days. Thank you for that!Again, thank you and congratulations for your achievements!

comments.author: Gulttam2a2
comments.body: First of all congratulations to you. You are an inspiration to small users like me. Ten years is a long time you are still associated with this forum we should really learn from you. May your future be brighter and stay healthy always. Best wishes again.

comments.author: KaosanRoad
comments.body: Me only been here a month.Like everyone else said, congratulations to you from me to.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Congrats! Continuing for 10 years is something to be proud of. You were active in 2013 and 2014. I would like you to tell us your experience, especially since during that period a large part of people lost their confidence in Bitcoin and it turned into a failed investment instead of a high-risk asset.I hope you celebrate 30 years, long life, health and wellness.
